synopsis.text:
Russia's unforgiving terrain serves as the backdrop for the intensifying pursuit of the lost Ainu gold in the latest installment of "Golden Kamuy." The formidable ex-convicts, each with their own tattooed skins, are determined to claim the treasure, even as they face new threats and challenges. Saichi 'The Immortal' Sugimoto and his Ainu companion Asirpa, now reunited, must navigate this treacherous landscape with renewed determination and a slightly altered ambition. As they leave Russian territory, they gain an enigmatic follower, adding another layer of complexity to their already perilous journey.
Meanwhile, Toshizou Hijikata's crew is making significant strides in their quest for the invaluable skins, but they risk falling into the deadly trap of a dangerous convict. Despite the advantages each group possesses, none can advance without Asirpa's help, including the most powerful and ruthless contender, First Lieutenant Tokushirou Tsurumi. However, his sinister plans for their inevitable encounter remain shrouded in mystery. As the race for the gold intensifies, the stakes are higher than ever, and the dangers more imminent. Will our heroes be able to outwit their foes and claim the treasure, or will they fall victim to the treacherous traps that lie ahead? Only time will tell in this thrilling and unpredictable adventure.
